long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
2-in-1: Reader Mode + Zoom 

Locates and zooms in on the title and main content of a webpage, thereby eliminating any distracting elements that you don't want to see while making the things you do want to see easier to read!

Features:
    - Extremely quick and reliable feature detection 
    - Does not affect website styling and layout
    - Works for any text language or display resolution

By default, the shortcut to activate Reader Mode is Left Shift + Space. 
Alternatively, click on the extension's icon in the toolbar.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,pt_BR,pt_PT,:
2-in-1: Reader Mode + Zoom 

Locates and zooms in on the title and main content of a webpage, thereby eliminating any distracting elements that you don't want to see while making the things you do want to see easier to read!

Features:
    - Extremely quick and reliable feature detection 
    - Does not affect website styling and layout
    - Works for any text language or display resolution

By default, the shortcut to activate Reader Mode is Left Shift + Space. 
Alternatively, click on the extension's icon in the toolbar.  

It supports PDFs
